page.title: 18A vegetarian's diet.
page.content: Mr Metcalfe told me he does not eat meat since he read a book called Animal Liberation.He disliked the way that animals were killed just for us to eat. That was six years ago and he feels his health has improved.Sometimes he eats fish. He is a teacher and on a typical working day he eats Muesli (oats,nuts, dried fruit and bran) for breakfast, followed by brown bread and marmalade but no butter.For lunch he has a cheese or salad sandwich made with brown bread.For supper,the night I visited him,he ate a cutlet made with nuts and sesame seeds,bread and an egg,with new potatoes and vegatables grown in his own garden.For pudding he had a slice of home-made fruit cake.
